ygData.subject: Re: EQ account for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Perhaps he, like me, is disgusted with anyone who would choose the lazy way of buying a character rather than creating your own. Also, perhaps he (like
ygData.messageBody:
>Why would you be disgusted? What is the big deal? So dude got sick of EQ
>and wants to sell off his hard work. So what? It's not like he is selling
>a
>child. Lest I remind you, and I fear I must, this is a "game". It might
>seem real to you but it isn't.
>
>Cooter
>(who is sometimes embarrassed that he has played enough to reach 17th
>level)

Perhaps he, like me, is disgusted with anyone who would choose the "lazy
way" of buying a character rather than creating your own. Also, perhaps he
(like me) believes the EQ bards to be a higher class of player than the
average "kewl dood" that buys/sells their characters.
Just my opinion, and I believe one that is shared by many.

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
